replies.msg: Ronald Koeman wants to be the man who'll lead the revolution of the club. Barça and him want to bet on bringing more physical freshness to the team and, above all, youth. [sport]

The signing of Norwegian striker Erling Haaland (20) is on the table, despite the Club's delicate financial situation. To achieve his signing, it's necessary to lighten the wage bill first, and therefore, players such as Umtiti, Firpo, Coutinho and Neto will have to be sold. [md]

Real Betis are preparing an offer of 9 million euros to sign Emerson, the right-back whom Barcelona own. Barça will reject it, as they see it viable to get a lot more money for the Brazilian, who will most likely do pre-season under Koeman's orders this summer. [md]
